alert.note: Alert for Western Chelan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 05 at 10:57AM PDT until April 05 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations between 3 and 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Holden Village, Stehekin, and Stevens Pass. * WHEN...Until 5 PM PDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Strong winds and weight of snow on tree limbs may down power lines and could cause sporadic power outages. Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: Monitor road and pass conditions before you begin your travel. Make sure your car is winterized and in good working order if you have plans to travel over Stevens Pass overnight through Tuesday morning. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
